item.description:
Local Real Estate Investor, Bruce Decker will share:

 

Nightmare on Dunlap St 

 A Cautionary Tale for New (and not-so-new) Investors      

Bruce will recount the details of how he came to own a property which went very, very bad, very quickly. He will share the incorrect thinking that led to a poor decision, as well as what he did right. This talk is designed to serve as a cautionary tale for new investors, but seasoned investors should also be able to acquire some nuggets as well.

 

Main Topics of Bruce's Presentation:

 

·      Investing pitfalls for the new investor: poor thinking patterns;

·      What to do when you get in over your head;

·      What he learned from his experience - and why he is still in         real estate.

 

Monthly Meeting

6:30 pm, November 17, 2011

Doubletree Guestsuites, 400 Soldier's Field Road, Boston, MA

free for members; $25 for non-members

free parking

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
